name: The One Who Knows
description:
The One Who Knows Hello! Welcome to The One Who Knows!

I am creating a psychological horror/escape game called "The One Who Knows"

(alternative title ideas appreciated). 

You wake up and quickly realize you are in the middle of the woods in an old

safehouse. You quickly find out that you are not alone here. The Unspoken knows

your every move and does not want you to escape. Can you figure out 

how to escape with someone watching your every move? 

I am very excited to share more with you as the game nears completion. In the

meantime you can follow my twitter: @theShowerGames with regular updates 

on the game.  Feedback is greatly appreciated!

COMING SOON
